name: screen-recorder-extension
description: A Chrome extension for recording tabs, windows, screens, page regions, and elements

scripts.build:extension: pnpm run build && node scripts/build-content.mjs && node scripts/build-background.mjs && node scripts/build-worker.mjs && node scripts/build-opfs-writer.mjs && node scripts/build-opfs-writer-worker.mjs && node scripts/build-offscreen2.mjs && cp static/manifest.json build/
scripts.package:extension: pnpm run build:extension && cd build && zip -r ../screen-recorder-extension.zip .
